name: SPECIAL HANOI STREET FOOD TOUR WITH EXPERT TOUR GUIDE
description: - Experienced and knowledgeable fully – licensed local tour guide who have a big love with Vietnamese Cuisine.- Eating 10+ mouth – watering dishes and drinks until you’re full and happy.- Eating in best local places for each dish in small restaurants which all have Certificate of Food Hygiene and Safety.- Small group tour with maximum of 10 people ensure a more personalized experience.- Learning how to cook some Vietnamese dishes.
